PluginViewModel.Name: AML2OPCUA (IOSB Webservice)
PluginViewModel.Author: Kathrin Bott, Pascal Habiger and Armin Karle (Supervision: Prof. Rainer Drath) Hochschule Pforzheim
PluginViewModel.Description: This AutomationML Editor plugin called 'AML2OPCUA (IOSB Webservice)' performs the mapping between AutomationML and OPC UA via a web interface to the online website of an existing implementation of FRAUNHOFER IOSB. A valid account is necessary.
